Audio.Author: Peter Boesman
Audio.Comments: This is an unidentified Scytalopus from the Choco region. Voice resembles superficially Stiles' Tapaculo, which should not occur here (?). It was quite common in an elevational range 1500-1700m, seemingly confined to this zone, in between Choco Tapaculo (lower) and Nariño Tapaculo (higher)
